pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimating Penalized Functional Linear Regression // Implementation of commonly used penalized functional linear regression models, including the Smooth and Locally Sparse (SLoS) method by Lin et al. (2016) doi:10.1080/10618600.2016.1195273, Nested Group bridge Regression (NGR) method by Guan et al. (2020) doi:10.1080/10618600.2020.1713797, Functional Linear Regression That's interpretable (FLIRTI) by James et al. (2009) doi:10.1214/08-AOS641, and the Penalized B-spline regression method.
